verses.name: Isaiah 22:18
verses.text: He will surely violently turn and toss thee like a ball into a large country: there shalt thou die, and there the chariots of thy glory shall be the shame of thy lord’s house.

verses.name: Isaiah 22:19
verses.text: And I will drive thee from thy station, and from thy state shall he pull thee down.

verses.name: Isaiah 22:20
verses.text: And it shall come to pass in that day, that I will call my servant Eliakim the son of Hilkiah:
